# Syllabus

Welcome to the course website for STAT 209, Introduction to Applied Statistics. To begin, you can find the course syllabus linked below:

- [Click here](syllabus209f25.html) to view the course syllabus

You can locate course content by scrolling, or by using the navigation bar in the upper left.  

Please note: material will not be posted until we've reached that point in the course.

<hr style="border: none; border-top: 5px solid black;">
